name: BSO
comment:
>>37688124

“I suppose.” You shrug, continuing in the direction of the tavern.

“Nngh. You don't think so?” He groans.

“I don't see why you think they shouldn't be allowed to make a guard rotation.”

“Eh, it's not /just/ them. All the guilds that are already on top—they're acting like they own the world cause they're just a little ahead.”

“They seem to be doing alright so far. I imagine there's a lot of gossip, but I don't have any reason to disbelieve either.” You recall what the guardsman said; so far, the goal of this game seems to be to reach the surface, and that's not something it sounds like any player can do alone. “Are you new?”

“Yeah. I just finished my first dungeon run. Some sweet drops,” He gestures to his boots as the two of you approach the tavern exterior, “And crafting materials too. I dunno what to do with 'em yet. What about you? Liking the game so far?”

> “I just started.”
> “I killed three nameless that attacked me outside Averron.”
> Other.
